job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWello Inc is looking for an energetic and motivated junior to midlevel Software Engineer to design code test debug and document software for our current and new innovative productsppnbspppDuties and ResponsibilitiespulliDesign develop test and debug software for Wello productsliliWork in multidisciplinary group onshoreoffshore to understand and implement interfaces between various software componentsnbspliliWork with internal and external customers to thoroughly understand product requirements and use cases to develop optimal software solutionsliliSupport software test manufacturing and customer support group to troubleshootresolve issuesliliWrite software engineering documents such as Software Architecture Document Detailed Design Document etcliliOnsiteRemote hybrid work environment Candidates must be in DFW Relocation not providedliliIndividual contributor role Wello is unable to provide workvisa sponsorship at this timeliulpnbspppBasic QualificationspulliBS in Computer Science Electrical Engineering Software Engineering or similar disciplinelili24 years of experience in software development using C and LinuxliliMust have experience andor strong understanding of SDLC Object Oriented Programming UML Modeling software design patterns and software development best practicesliliExperience in User Interface development embedded or desktop requiredliulpnbspppPreferred Skills and ExperiencepulliPrior experience with User interface development in QT strongly preferredliliExperience in developing multithreaded applications preferredliliExperience in Medical Device or other highly regulated industry is strongly preferredliliExperience with GIT source controlliliExperience with communication protocols such as ethernet TCPIP UDP i2C USB is a plusliliFamiliarity or some experience with web development LAMP MERN stack is a plusliliFamiliarity with SQL is a plusliliExperience with bash scripts and Python is a plusliliFamiliarity with Internet of Things AWS Azure Google Cloud etc is a plusliulpnbspppAbout WelloppnbspppSince 2014 Wello has been on a mission to end the spread of contagious illness and set a new standard in employee health and safety We provide temperature screening stations instant badges and flexible reporting and alerts to lower the risk of COVID19 and other contagious illnesses in the workplaceppnbspppWello is also a great place to work Our team is passionate about health and safety and that shows in our workplace and culture We provide generous compensation packages including medical dental and vision benefits and paid time off to support you in doing your best work We are dedicated to diversity and we believe that a variety of backgrounds and perspectives leads to the strongest organizations We encourage individuals from all races ethnicities nationalities genders sexual orientations and abilities to applyppnbsppulliPlease apply via LinkedIn or email your resume and cover letter to careerswelloinccom We look forward to meeting youliul
